name: Google
description: Google is a multinational technology company specializing in Internet-related services and products, including search engines, online advertising, cloud computing, and hardware.

name: Apple
description: Apple is a global technology company known for its innovative consumer electronics, software, and services, including the iPhone, Mac, and Apple Watch.

name: Microsoft
description: Microsoft is a leading software company that develops and sells computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services.

name: Facebook
description: Facebook, now known as Meta, is a multinational technology company focusing on social networking, augmented reality, and virtual reality.
